alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Lancaster; Sarpy; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 11:36PM CDT until April 19 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sarpy County in east central Nebraska... Northeastern Lancaster County in southeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Douglas County in east central Nebraska... Southeastern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1135 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Raymond, or 15 miles southwest of Wahoo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ceresco around 1145 PM CDT. Ithaca around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Mead and Yutan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
